subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: A 1-0 victory at Chelsea on Dec. 6 set the team's confidence alight, and a 2-1 win at home over Manchester United had it soaring off the scale.
snippet: A 1-0 victory at Chelsea on Dec. 6 set the team's confidence alight, and a 2-1 win at home over Manchester United had it soaring off the scale.
